9.1 /r/event/stream - Reference Documentation

Authors: Microsoft Corporation

Version: 8.0.0

9.1 /r/event/stream

This call connects to one of the following event streams: authenticated, anonymous, or management.

Both the current authenticated status of the caller on this call and the parameters passed on the call determine the ultimate nature of the event stream connection.

By default, authenticated event streams deliver server-wide execution and job lifecycle events for the authenticated user. If the httpEventOnly parameter is specified then an authenticated event stream will see only execution events associated with the current HTTP session.

HTTP Method

WEBSOCKET

Parameters

  • managementEventOnly - (optional) if specified, then event stream connection type is management
  • httpEventOnly – (optional) if specified, then execution events are limited to events associated with the current HTTP session
  • revoEventOnly – (optional) if specified, then execution executionConsoleEvent events are suppressed on the stream

Examples 

managementEventOnly=true

Response Markup (JSON)

//
// Note: The event property in the response markup contains a complete,
// self-contained description for the event.
//
// Event: streamConnectEvent
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "streamConnectEvent",
                "context": "testuser",
                "whoami": "testuser",
                "httpcookie": "7E25FE0FEB5E41454AB6A054FB697EA7",
                "success": true
            },
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "call": "null",
            "success": true,
            "httpcookie": "7E25FE0FEB5E41454AB6A054FB697EA7"
        }
    }
}
// Event: streamDisconnectEvent
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "streamDisconnectEvent",
                "context": "testuser",
                "whoami": "testuser",
                "httpcookie": null,
                "success": true
            },
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "call": "null",
            "success": true
        }
    }
}
// Event: executionConsoleEvent
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "executionConsoleEvent",
                "context": "PROJECT-53d17dec-07ad-4323-ae7a-e4219df4c300",
                "http": "7E25FE0FEB5E41454AB6A054FB697EA7",
                "output": "n> x <- rnorm(3)n",
                "object": null,
                "success": true,
                "error": null
            },
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "success": true,
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "httpcookie": "7E25FE0FEB5E41454AB6A054FB697EA7"
        }
    }
}

//
// Event: executionConsoleEvent (error)
//
// A non-null error property indicates an R error.
//
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "executionConsoleEvent",
                "context": "PROJECT-1b1ffafa-f6e8-468b-a4a1-1323743496b7",
                "http": "6A8C8D0B1CB161B8D140F78267363F87",
                "output": "object 'y' not found",
                "object": null,
                "success": false,
                "error": "object 'y' not found"
            },
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "success": true,
            "httpcookie": "6A8C8D0B1CB161B8D140F78267363F87"
        }
    }
}

// Event: executionRevoEvent
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "executionRevoEvent",
                "context": "PROJECT-53d17dec-07ad-4323-ae7a-e4219df4c300",
                "http": "7E25FE0FEB5E41454AB6A054FB697EA7",
                "output": "> revoEvent(x)n",
                "object": {
                    "rclass": "numeric",
                    "name": "x",
                    "value": [
                        0.6928559348535657,
                        -0.4710822416485657,
                        -0.5175046426793741
                    ],
                    "type": "vector"
                },
                "success": true,
                "error": null
            },
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "success": true,
            "httpcookie": "7E25FE0FEB5E41454AB6A054FB697EA7"
        }
    }
}
// Event: executionErrorEvent
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "success": true,
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "httpcookie": "E56973C85A9E8A527CDC234958476152",
            "event": {
                "type": "executionErrorEvent",
                "context": "PROJECT-7656fec9-8882-4c0c-a366-10fca02df173",
                "http": "E56973C85A9E8A527CDC234958476152",
                "output": "unexpected symboln1: x yn ^",
                "object": null,
                "success": false,
                "error": "unexpected symboln1: x yn ^"
            }
        }
    }
}

// Event: jobLifecycleEvent
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "jobLifecycleEvent",
                "context": "JOB-ef2d7ead-2278-48bb-a344-585febfad550",
                "jobname": "Sample Job",
                "jobowner": "testuser",
                "jobdescr": null,
                "jobpriority": "low",
                "jobstatus": "Completed",
                "jobstatusmsg": "Job successfully executed to completion.",
                "jobproject": "PROJECT-35e56b83-5b11-43b9-a494-635685923ede"
            },
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "success": true,
            "call": "/r/event/stream"
        }
    }
}
//
// Management Event Stream events follow:
//
//
// Event: gridActivityEvent
//
// The isLive property indicates activity start or stop.
//
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "gridActivityEvent",
                "context": "PROJECT-ee994678-e0c4-4df4-bca4-72c4b31f032d",
                "activity": "Project: Sample Project",
                "owner": "testuser",
                "http": "2AEC4C4168B04FA5350A4C6924F46AC4",
                "node": "DeployR Default Node",
                "nodetype": "Authenticated",
                "isLive": true
            },
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "success": true,
            "httpcookie": "2AEC4C4168B04FA5350A4C6924F46AC4"
        }
    }
}
//
// Event: gridWarningEvent
//
// The errorcode property indicates the specific warning.
//
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "gridWarningEvent",
                "context": "Concurrent authenticated project limit (1) reached for user testuser.",
                "error": "Concurrent authenticated project limit (1) reached for user testuser.",
                "errorcode": "910"
            },
            "whoami": "deployr",
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "success": true,
            "httpcookie": "grid"
        }
    }
}
//
// Event: gridHeartbeatEvent
//
// Each node on the grid has an entry in the list found
// on the nodes property.
//
// The slotactivity property on each node details the
// current slot activity for that node.
//
// The "active" property on each node indicates if the
// grid node is currently responsive. If false, the node
// is temporarily out-of-service.
//
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "success": true,
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "whoami": "deployr",
            "httpcookie": "grid",
            "event": {
                "type": "gridHeartbeatEvent",
                "context": "184.106.156.235:7000",
                "totalnodes": 2,
                "enablednodes": 2,
                "activenodes": 2,
                "totalslots": 200,
                "activeslots": 2,
                "nodes": [
                    {
                        "node": "NODE-1d02719e-c834-4033-8351-dd869afd79dc",
                        "name": "DeployR Default Node",
                        "description": "Default R processing node, mixed function.",
                        "type": "Mixed Mode",
                        "enabled": true,
                        "active": true,
                        "slotlimit": 100,
                        "slotcount": 1,
                        "slotactivity": [
                            {
                                "actor": "admin",
                                "activity": "PROJECT-421d6011-8b5c-4695-9da9-9bccbccca9c5",
                                "context": "Temporary Project",
                                "node": "DeployR Default Node",
                                "nodetype": "Authenticated",
                                "actorhttp": "D5C545B028A1A046FC80FC924084EA51",
                                "actorip": "75.147.180.59"
                            }
                        ]
                    },
                    {
                        "node": "NODE-77854d45-3a70-48f2-ba7f-2c91ca162935",
                        "name": "Auxiliary Node",
                        "description": "Remote R processing node, mixed function.",
                        "type": "Mixed Mode",
                        "enabled": true,
                        "active": true,
                        "slotlimit": 100,
                        "slotcount": 1,
                        "slotactivity": [
                            {
                                "actor": "testuser",
                                "activity": "JOB-55c6b4ff-a5b1-4c67-a886-b16cd976e54f",
                                "context": "Job: Demo Job.",
                                "node": "Auxiliary Node",
                                "nodetype": "Asynchronous",
                                "actorhttp": null,
                                "actorip": null
                            }
                        ]
                    }
                ]
            }
        }
    }
}
// Event: securityLoginEvent
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "securityLoginEvent",
                "context": "2B58D80182E3234940E201902017DD69",
                "http": "2B58D80182E3234940E201902017DD69",
                "username": "testuser",
                "displayname": "DeployR API Test Account",
                "error": null
            },
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "success": true,
            "httpcookie": "2B58D80182E3234940E201902017DD69"
        }
    }
}

//
// Event: securityLoginEvent (failure)
//
// A non-null error property indicates login failure.
//
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "securityLoginEvent",
                "context": "3AC5F8F978999C786E72FBC87BA4A273",
                "http": "3AC5F8F978999C786E72FBC87BA4A273",
                "username": "george",
                "displayname": null,
                "error": "User george could not be authenticated."
            },
            "whoami": "george",
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "success": true,
            "httpcookie": "3AC5F8F978999C786E72FBC87BA4A273",
        }
    }
}

// Event: securityLogoutEvent
{
    "deployr": {
        "response": {
            "event": {
                "type": "securityLogoutEvent",
                "context": "15DBF1BF7F2A19EF535588B634342C98",
                "http": "15DBF1BF7F2A19EF535588B634342C98",
                "username": "testuser",
                "displayname": "DeployR API Test Account",
                "error": null
            }
            "whoami": "testuser",
            "call": "/r/event/stream",
            "success": true,
            "httpcookie": "15DBF1BF7F2A19EF535588B634342C98",
        }
    }
}
